nextSession.title: Chapter 46 - Descending the Secret Staircase
nextSession.description: After killing Rahadin, a secret staircase was found in his office for the third time. The staircase leads down, and the group knows that Sergei's tomb with the Tome of Strahd must be further down under the castle.

events.value: Firewatch's nightmares from the Mystery Mine will fade.
Florian, Cassandra, and Cloud's boon expire.

nextSession.title: Chapter 19 - Atop the Stump
nextSession.description: After defeating the Brigands and their leader Agdon Longscarf at the Brigands Tollway, the group stands on top of a large stump having to decide which way to go next.
